page.title: 18Childrens toys, Cotteridges
page.content: My favourite toy is the Zoids Giant Zrk. It is a 35 cm{robot dinosaur,}is powered by batteries and can walk. As it walks its neck rises and falls. There are small robots inside the head and on the back and 3 swivel guns. At the end of the tail a third robot sits in a gun emplacement. {Zoids come as a kit}and the Giant Zrk took me a few hours to build. it cost #10.99. My friend's favourite is his {Helicopter Technical Lego Set.}It has moving rotors and tail, a braking system and movable landing gear. There are two red seats which move and two computers in the front cab. It is 40 cm long, took two hours to build and cost about #20. A third favourite toy is the {Gyro Tennis Game}for two people. It involves hitting a ball attached to a spiral on a post. It is a very exciting game but sometimes the string comes off the top.
